name: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc.
description: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. is a leading real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in the development, acquisition, and management of high-quality properties in the life sciences and technology sectors. Founded in 1994 and headquartered in Pasadena, California, Alexandria focuses on urban, innovation cluster locations that are critical to the growth of life sciences and technology companies. With a robust portfolio encompassing over 30 million square feet of space, Alexandria is committed to providing state-of-the-art facilities that meet the needs of its tenants, which include prominent biotech and pharmaceutical firms, as well as research institutions. The company is recognized for its sustainable building practices, innovative design, and the ability to create collaborative environments that foster scientific advancement. Alexandria also plays a vital role in the communities it serves by promoting the health and well-being of its employees and stakeholders. As a pioneer in the life sciences real estate market, Alexandria Real Estate Equities aims to drive long-term value for its shareholders while being a leader in the sustainability movement within the real estate sector.

seo.meta_title: Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. | Life Sciences and Technology REIT
seo.meta_description: Explore Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc., a leader in life sciences real estate investment. Learn about our innovative properties and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Alexandria Real Estate Equities specialize in?
faq.answer: Alexandria specializes in the development and management of properties for life sciences and technology companies.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Alexandria Real Estate Equities?
faq.answer: Joel S. Marcus is the CEO of Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Alexandria Real Estate Equities headquartered?
faq.answer: Alexandria is headquartered in Pasadena, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Alexandria manage?
faq.answer: Alexandria manages laboratories, office spaces, research facilities, and innovation centers.
